Flub.Name: Size
Flub.Description: The relative size of the rocks generated by the noise.

Flub.Name: Density
Flub.Description: The relative density of the rocks generated by the noise.

Flub.Name: Octaves
Flub.Description: Each octave adds smaller/subdivided rocks in between the larger ones from the previous octave.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
